<sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-09-01 14:56:14</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e3d2df64c3031010fc869bc8a840dd70</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>78</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-03-17 05:11:12</sys_updated_on> <value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) { try { var LOGGER = new sn_va_teams.VAMSTeamsLogger('VAMSTeamsAdapterGetUpdatedPreviousMsg'); LOGGER.debug('[MS Teams Adapter Get Updated Previous Msg] Inputs : ' + JSON.stringify(inputs));
var teamsUtil = new VAMicrosoftTeamsUtil();
var appInboundId = inputs['app_inbound_id']; var providerUserId = inputs['provider_user_id']; var payloadJson = inputs['payload']; var currentMsgJson = inputs['current_msg'];
if (!appInboundId || !providerUserId) { return; }
// if previous msg is not present, then return var previousMsg = getPreviousMsgFromUserContext(appInboundId, providerUserId); // object or undefined
if (teamsUtil.isEmptyObject(previousMsg) || teamsUtil.isEmptyObject(previousMsg['ms_out'])) { return; }
// if previous msg is present and there are no action buttons in it. var previousMsOut = previousMsg['ms_out'];
LOGGER.debug('[MS Teams Adapter Get Updated Previous Msg] Previous Msg : ' + JSON.stringify(previousMsOut));
var previousMsOutAttachments = previousMsOut['attachments']; // array var hasActionButtons = teamsUtil.hasActionButtons(previousMsOutAttachments); // True/False if (!hasActionButtons) { removePreviousMsgFromUserContext(appInboundId, providerUserId); return; }
// if previous msg is present and has actions in it, then remove the non-link buttons var payload = JSON.parse(payloadJson);
// get message id from previous message or replyToId from payload. var replyToId = previousMsg['message_id'] || payload['replyToId'] || ''; var values = payload['value'] || {}; var summary = previousMsOut['summary'] || '';
// if previous message id is empty or null, return and don't update the message if (!(replyToId && parseInt(replyToId, 10))) { return; }
// handle live agent card var isPreviousMsOutLiveAgentCard = teamsUtil.isLiveAgentFeedbackMsg(previousMsOutAttachments, hasActionButtons); if (isPreviousMsOutLiveAgentCard) { var currentMsOut = JSON.parse(currentMsgJson); currentMsOut['attachments'] = currentMsOut['attachments'] || ''; var currentMsOutAttachments = currentMsOut['attachments']; if (teamsUtil.isValidLiveAgentCard(currentMsOutAttachments)) { // send the current msg as an update // assign outputs currentMsOut = getOnlyRequiredMsOutFields(currentMsOut, currentMsOutAttachments); outputs['should_send_msg_as_update'] = true; outputs['updated_ms_out_str'] = JSON.stringify(currentMsOut); outputs['message_id'] = replyToId; removePreviousMsgFromUserContext(appInboundId, providerUserId); } return; }
// remove actions expect link buttons var newAttachments = MSTeamsRemoveActionsUtil.removeActions(previousMsOutAttachments, values, summary);
newAttachments.forEach(function(newAttachmentsArray) {
var attachmentBody = newAttachmentsArray.content.body;
//if input type is secure change the input block to text block attachmentBody.forEach(function(body) { if (body.type === 'Input.Text' && body.style === 'Password') { body['type'] = "TextBlock"; body['text'] = "••••••••••" } });
newAttachmentsArray.content.body = attachmentBody; });
/* With STRY53200370 changes pick up only the last attachment from payload to disable the previous selected button */
if (newAttachments.length > 1) { var lastAttachmentArray = new Array(newAttachments[newAttachments.length - 1]); newAttachments = lastAttachmentArray; }
previousMsOut['attachments'] = newAttachments; previousMsOut['text'] = '';
// assign outputs previousMsOut = getOnlyRequiredMsOutFields(previousMsOut, newAttachments); outputs['updated_ms_out_str'] = JSON.stringify(previousMsOut); outputs['message_id'] = replyToId;
removePreviousMsgFromUserContext(appInboundId, providerUserId);
LOGGER.debug('[MS Teams Adapter Get Updated Previous Msg] Outputs : ' + JSON.stringify(outputs)); } catch (e) { LOGGER.error('[MS Teams Adapter Get Updated Previous Msg] Error : ' + e.message); }
function getOnlyRequiredMsOutFields(inputResult, newAttachments) { var msOut = {}; var messageObj = teamsUtil.transformOutboundMsgToMSOut(JSON.stringify(inputResult), newAttachments);
if (!teamsUtil.isEmptyObject(messageObj)) { msOut['conversation_id'] = messageObj['conversation_id'] || ''; msOut['tenant_id'] = messageObj['tenant_id'] || ''; msOut['service_url'] = messageObj['service_url'] || ''; msOut['origin_service_url'] = messageObj['origin_service_url'] || ''; msOut['type'] = messageObj['type'] || ''; msOut['activity'] = messageObj['activity'] || ''; }
return msOut; }
function getPreviousMsgFromUserContext(appInboundId, providerUserId) { var previousMsgJson = sn_cs.VASystemObject.getProviderUserContext('previous_msg', appInboundId, providerUserId); if (previousMsgJson && !previousMsgJson.equals('undefined') && !previousMsgJson.equals('null')) { var previousMsg = JSON.parse(previousMsgJson); // Object if (!teamsUtil.isEmptyObject(previousMsg)) { return previousMsg; } } }
function removePreviousMsgFromUserContext(appInboundId, providerUserId) { return sn_cs.VASystemObject.setProviderUserContextImmediately('previous_msg', '', appInboundId, providerUserId); } })(inputs, outputs);</value> <variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable> </sys_variable_value> <sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" <sys_mod_count>74</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-03-17 05:11:14</sys_updated_on> <value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) { try { var LOGGER = new sn_va_teams.VAMSTeamsLogger('VAMSTeamsAdapterGetUpdatedPreviousMsg'); LOGGER.debug('[MS Teams Adapter Get Updated Previous Msg] Inputs : ' + JSON.stringify(inputs));
var teamsUtil = new VAMicrosoftTeamsUtil();
var appInboundId = inputs['app_inbound_id']; var providerUserId = inputs['provider_user_id']; var payloadJson = inputs['payload']; var currentMsgJson = inputs['current_msg'];
if (!appInboundId || !providerUserId) { return; }
// if previous msg is not present, then return var previousMsg = getPreviousMsgFromUserContext(appInboundId, providerUserId); // object or undefined
if (teamsUtil.isEmptyObject(previousMsg) || teamsUtil.isEmptyObject(previousMsg['ms_out'])) { return; }
// if previous msg is present and there are no action buttons in it. var previousMsOut = previousMsg['ms_out'];
LOGGER.debug('[MS Teams Adapter Get Updated Previous Msg] Previous Msg : ' + JSON.stringify(previousMsOut));
var previousMsOutAttachments = previousMsOut['attachments']; // array var hasActionButtons = teamsUtil.hasActionButtons(previousMsOutAttachments); // True/False if (!hasActionButtons) { removePreviousMsgFromUserContext(appInboundId, providerUserId); return; }
// if previous msg is present and has actions in it, then remove the non-link buttons var payload = JSON.parse(payloadJson);
// get message id from previous message or replyToId from payload. var replyToId = previousMsg['message_id'] || payload['replyToId'] || ''; var values = payload['value'] || {}; var summary = previousMsOut['summary'] || '';
// if previous message id is empty or null, return and don't update the message if (!(replyToId && parseInt(replyToId, 10))) { return; }
// handle live agent card var isPreviousMsOutLiveAgentCard = teamsUtil.isLiveAgentFeedbackMsg(previousMsOutAttachments, hasActionButtons); if (isPreviousMsOutLiveAgentCard) { var currentMsOut = JSON.parse(currentMsgJson); currentMsOut['attachments'] = currentMsOut['attachments'] || ''; var currentMsOutAttachments = currentMsOut['attachments']; if (teamsUtil.isValidLiveAgentCard(currentMsOutAttachments)) { // send the current msg as an update // assign outputs currentMsOut = getOnlyRequiredMsOutFields(currentMsOut, currentMsOutAttachments); outputs['should_send_msg_as_update'] = true; outputs['updated_ms_out_str'] = JSON.stringify(currentMsOut); outputs['message_id'] = replyToId; removePreviousMsgFromUserContext(appInboundId, providerUserId); } return; }
// remove actions expect link buttons var newAttachments = MSTeamsRemoveActionsUtil.removeActions(previousMsOutAttachments, values, summary);
newAttachments.forEach(function(newAttachmentsArray) {
var attachmentBody = newAttachmentsArray.content.body;
//if input type is secure change the input block to text block attachmentBody.forEach(function(body) { if (body.type === 'Input.Text' && body.style === 'Password') { body['type'] = "TextBlock"; body['text'] = "••••••••••" } });
newAttachmentsArray.content.body = attachmentBody; });
/* With STRY53200370 changes pick up only the last attachment from payload to disable the previous selected button */
if (newAttachments.length > 1) { var lastAttachmentArray = new Array(newAttachments[newAttachments.length - 1]); newAttachments = lastAttachmentArray; }
previousMsOut['attachments'] = newAttachments; previousMsOut['text'] = '';
// assign outputs previousMsOut = getOnlyRequiredMsOutFields(previousMsOut, newAttachments); outputs['updated_ms_out_str'] = JSON.stringify(previousMsOut); outputs['message_id'] = replyToId;
removePreviousMsgFromUserContext(appInboundId, providerUserId);
LOGGER.debug('[MS Teams Adapter Get Updated Previous Msg] Outputs : ' + JSON.stringify(outputs)); } catch (e) { LOGGER.error('[MS Teams Adapter Get Updated Previous Msg] Error : ' + e.message); }
function getOnlyRequiredMsOutFields(inputResult, newAttachments) { var msOut = {}; var messageObj = teamsUtil.transformOutboundMsgToMSOut(JSON.stringify(inputResult), newAttachments);
if (!teamsUtil.isEmptyObject(messageObj)) { msOut['conversation_id'] = messageObj['conversation_id'] || ''; msOut['tenant_id'] = messageObj['tenant_id'] || ''; msOut['service_url'] = messageObj['service_url'] || ''; msOut['origin_service_url'] = messageObj['origin_service_url'] || ''; msOut['type'] = messageObj['type'] || ''; msOut['activity'] = messageObj['activity'] || ''; }
return msOut; }
function getPreviousMsgFromUserContext(appInboundId, providerUserId) { var previousMsgJson = sn_cs.VASystemObject.getProviderUserContext('previous_msg', appInboundId, providerUserId); if (previousMsgJson && !previousMsgJson.equals('undefined') && !previousMsgJson.equals('null')) { var previousMsg = JSON.parse(previousMsgJson); // Object if (!teamsUtil.isEmptyObject(previousMsg)) { return previousMsg; } } }
function removePreviousMsgFromUserContext(appInboundId, providerUserId) { return sn_cs.VASystemObject.setProviderUserContextImmediately('previous_msg', '', appInboundId, providerUserId); } })(inputs, outputs);</value> <variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable> </sys_variable_value> <sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple"
